message.body: Should my history paper have headings? Or should it all just flow?
Liza. This is the worst paper i've ever written. And it's still just four pages long. I haven't slept, i'm sick with nerves and have been all night. But
it will all be over soon. I guess i'll attach a cover letter to the hard copy i turn in. I'll explain that it's totally unsatisfactory, but that i will
complete it over senior week so that it can join the student essay compilation he wants to put together and so that i know i haven't left it in such a st
Yes. That sounds good. I am sorry you're in this place! But you are right, we are almost through, and this is the last thing. I'm eating at 11 if you're up and want food/hugs! <3
I'm going to sleep until five and the bell ringing. Love you.
